attributes.action: bestow a state funeral on the recently deceased Henry Allingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bestow a state funeral on the recently deceased Henry Allingham to show the gratitude for the work that he has done in keeping those who perished in the First World War in our minds

rejection.details: Henry Allingham will receive a public funeral with military honours.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
